name: Arseon
description:
The police are on your tail, hide your trail by burning everything in sight Controls

  

Use WASD to move around

 

Use the left mouse button to pick up flammable objects

 

Use the scroll wheel to rotate the item you picked up

 

Use R to reload the level

 

Use Escape to pause and resume the game. Why the name

Game's arse

Credits
  • ylmir for the rain sound effect
  • rubberduck for the droplet sound effect
  • Mike Koenig for the sizzle sound effect (CC BY 3.0)
  • Additional sound effects from https://freesfx.co.uk
